channel.title: [Class] the snatcher
channel.description:
Neutral offensive Goal: live to see the blue dragon fall
**Kidnap** (day, infinite uses) place the target in your basement tonight. If the prince jails them, or they are the prince, you will be informed of your failure come night fall. Cannot be used if a player is already in your basement.
**Torture** (day, 1 uses) torture your abductee come nightfall; you will learn their class
**Execute** (night, 2 uses) kill your abductee, bypassing death immunity
**Release** (night, infinite uses) release your abductee
Additional information: -you can converse with your abductee at night, like a prince to his target -the person in your basement dos not show up to court if you keep him in your basement without executing/releasing -players are informed when a player goes missing because of you -you can leave ransom notes -players left in your basement at the end of the day do not count towards the vote cap. -upon your death, if you still have someone in your basement, they are released -players in your basement over the day can view what is going on but not partake in any event (stepping forward for king, accusing of treason, being accused of treason, voting, or using day abilities)

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description:
I don’t like it

0/10
Crappy NE jailor

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
This Class just doesn’t have a place here honestly.

Abducting people and keeping them from the game itself is just overpowered, and with this being able to take 2 people out of action, is just very overpowered. It’s an evil prince that can take up to 2 people. I suggested something similar in my Brotherhood thread, called the Deputy, jail a person, keep them in through the next day. It didn’t fit with the game and thus, I’m going to say No to this.

Which, in turn, means that @JammySplodge wouldn’t like it too.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
he only abducts one player at a time.

also it is now neutral offensive.

you are supposed to only abduct people who are all but confirmed and keep them as pets.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

-players in your basement over the day can view what is going on but not partake in any event (stepping forward for king, accusing of treason, being accused of treason, voting, or using day abilities)

It becomes a game of “Oh thingy isn’t talking and we can’t vote them, they’re kidnapped”

Which will narrow down the game and you’ll be able to find this easily.

Also, once more.

RopeStringFace:

Neutral killer
Goal: Live to see the blue dragon fall

NK that can win with other evils is a no.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
it has been edited now, much more balanced

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

This is really OP. You can just kidnap random people can get their class.

that’s the idea. You randomly kidnap players, torture to get their class, and execute the powerful BD.

Ami:

Then they know The Snatcher is in the game.

this does lower the OPness, does it not?

Ami:

Let see, Toture-Investgative
Execute-Killer. This isn’t Neutral WIldcard.

what is it then? support?

Ami:

Make it that you can only have 1 person, then you can balance it abit

Will do.

[quote=“Ami, post:3, topic:2324”]
Need I go on?
[/quote] yes

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
I’m iffy about this Neutral Prince.

At least Prince need to ask his prisoner’s class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
This isn’t very balanced.

RopeStringFace:

Torture (night, infinite uses)
Torture your basement’s occupants into revealing their class to you.

This is really OP. You can just kidnap random people can get their class.

RopeStringFace:

-players are informed in the morning of a player having been kidnapped or released, after the deaths are announced

Then they know The Snatcher is in the game.

RopeStringFace:

Neutral wildcard

Let see, Toture-Investgative
Execute-Killer. This isn’t Neutral WIldcard.

RopeStringFace:

Kidnap (day, infinite uses)
place the target in your basement tonight. If the prince jails them, or they are the prince, you will be informed of your failure come night fall. Cannot be used if two players are already in your basement

Make it that you can only have 1 person, then you can balance it abit

Need I go on?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class] the snatcher
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

Neutral wildcard

RopeStringFace:

Execute (day, 2 uses)
kill your target abductee come nightfall.

Doesn’t fit the type.

I don’t like this Class, simply because it’s abilities don’t fit the type.

Read full topic

item.description:
Neutral offensive
Goal: live to see the blue dragon fall

Kidnap (day, infinite uses)
place the target in your basement tonight. If the prince jails them, or they are the prince, you will be informed of your failure come night fall. Cannot be used if a player is already in your basement.

Torture (day, 1 uses) torture your abductee come nightfall; you will learn their class

Execute (night, 2 uses) kill your abductee, bypassing death immunity

Release (night, infinite uses) release your abductee

Additional information:
-you can converse with your abductee at night, like a prince to his target
-the person in your basement dos not show up to court if you keep him in your basement without executing/releasing
-players are informed when a player goes missing because of you

-players left in your basement at the end of the day do not count towards the vote cap.
-upon your death, if you still have someone in your basement, they are released
-players in your basement over the day can view what is going on but not partake in any event (stepping forward for king, accusing of treason, being accused of treason, voting, or using day abilities)
